2022-09-26 10:24
Today I had cause to look at slides from a talk I gave at @ffconf in 2011 called "Excessive Enhancement". It was a cautionary tail of web development. I fear I could give a talk with the exact same slide deck today and it would be just as pertinent as I felt it was then 😢
